summary.div: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
summary.para: Contains information that is common to every type of MFPlay event.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_HEADER.eEventType
member.summary: The type of event, specified as a member of the enumeration.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_HEADER.hrEvent
member.summary: Error or success code for the operation that caused the event.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_HEADER.pMediaPlayer
member.summary: Pointer to the interface of the MFPlay player object that sent the event.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_HEADER.eState
member.summary: The new state of the MFPlay player object, specified as a member of the enumeration.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_HEADER.pPropertyStore
member.summary: A pointer to the IPropertyStore interface of a property store object. The property store is used to hold additional event data for some event types. This member might be NULL.
